Grade Calculator

  • Assignment must be named
  • Weights must fall in the 1% to 100% range
  • Scores can fall in the 0% to 999% range (e.g. 102% is a very possible test score)
  • The weighted total cannot exceed 100%
  • No more than 2 decimal places
  • Number formatting:
    • There must be one, two, or three digits to the left of decimal
    • There can be zero, one, or two digits to the right of decimal
    • Both scores and weights can be made up of anywhere from one to five digits
    • OK: ###.## or ###.# or ### (e.g. 102.49% or 45.2% or 98%)
    • BAD: ####.# or ##.### or ###.or ###### (e.g. 0073.4% or 54.272% or 042.%or 09001%)
If one of those conditions isn't met, you won't be able to add the assignment until you fix it
